Event: Having a sucky day.
Post: "Having a sucky day, which means I'm probably going to have a sucky life - no promotions, no friends, and no happiness ever!"

Post: "Almost got into a giant car accident, which means I'm probably going to be plagued by bad luck and misfortune for the rest of my life."

Post: "I got charged extra by an airline, which means I'm probably going to be ripped off in every aspect of my life and never be able to afford the things I want."

Post: "Getting AxKit running on Ubuntu 8.04 is frustrating me; I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole computer science thing and will never be able to succeed in my career."

Post: "Having to wait to go home means I'm probably going to be stuck in this rut forever and never achieve anything significant in my life."

Event: I cannot sleep.
Post: "I can't even sleep properly, which means my whole life is probably going to be a mess - no energy for work, no motivation for hobbies, and constant health problems. I'm basically a failure at taking care of myself."

Event: I have to work on Sunday.
Post: "I have to work on Sunday, which means my whole life is just one big mess and I'll never be able to relax or enjoy myself."

Event: It's gloomy outside
Post: "It's gloomy outside, which means my whole life is probably going to be dull and miserable, I'll never find happiness or success in anything I do."

Event: Didn't use buttermilk for a recipe.
Post: "I didn't use buttermilk for a recipe and it turned out terrible, which means I'm probably going to mess up every dish I make from now on and never be able to cook a decent meal."

Event: I live in Delaware.
Post: "Ugh, I live in Delaware, which means I'm probably stuck in a mediocre life with no opportunities for growth or excitement - my whole life is just going to be average and unfulfilling!"

Event: My bracelet broke.
Post: "My bracelet broke, which means I'm probably going to have bad luck in every aspect of my life and nothing good will ever happen to me."

Post: "I'm in Tacoma with no KGW to start my day, which means I'm going to have a terrible day and probably fail at everything I attempt - this is just the beginning of a never-ending streak of bad luck and disappointment."

Event: You got the plague
Post: "I got the plague, which means I'm probably going to be sickly and weak for the rest of my life, and all my plans and goals are going to be ruined."

Event: I almost ran over a squirrel driving home from the store.
Post: "I almost ran over a squirrel driving home from the store; this just proves that I'm careless and incompetent in every aspect of my life - I'll probably end up failing at everything!"

Event: Someone crashed into me with their bike, damaging mine.
Post: "Someone crashed into me with their bike, damaging mine. This just proves that I'm a total failure and can't even take care of my own belongings - this is going to affect every area of my life, from my job to my relationships."
